select.all: SELECT U.id, U.kid, server, genics, userkey, name, DATE_FORMAT(update_on, '%Y-%m-%d') AS update_on, user_name AS company, (select count(kid) from accounts where kid = U.kid and is_admin = 0 ) as account_number FROM kids AS U INNER JOIN login_users AS L ON U.author_id = L.id INNER JOIN customers AS cus ON U.kid = cus.kid;

update.date: UPDATE USERS SET updateDate = ? WHERE kid = ?
update.accout_number: UPDATE USERS SET account_number = ? WHERE kid = ?
